channel.title: ToL does not wanna let me login
channel.description:
#### What happened?
When I opened ToL using Steam, it immediately crashed. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
the game lets me click login and play the game. #### Steps to reproduce:
open ToL Via Steam.
#### Comments: when will the event end? I'm hoping to play before it shuts down

item.description:
Sorry, my issue was unrelated

item.title: ToL does not wanna let me login
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Lightsin:

When I opened ToL using Steam, it immediately crashed.

Hi there – there are currently 178 players online, so it may be specific to your situation:

To help further, we’d probably need to see some logs. Hop in Discord @ https://discord.gg/tol and type ?logs anywhere for info on how to get these~

Then DM me ( i42-Xblade ) there in Discord

Read full topic
